title: Increase Equipment LV in Item World
Purchase pieces of 10 Equipment in RQ Shop
Complete all Missions in Main Story [Easy] EP 3
Pass a Boost agenda in the Dark Assembly
Raise Weapon Mastery to Lv4
description:
Accumulated Weapon EXP
can be used to raise Weapon Mastery.

When your characters equip weapons,
they will gain Weapon EXP by clearing stages.

Use weapons to clear stages
and raise Weapon Mastery!

title: Try using Weapon Statues
description:
Apaer from clearing stages,
you can also use Statues to raise Weapon Mastery.

Enter a character's details screen, select Weapon Mastery,
then use “Statues” to gain Weapon EXP.

Use Statues
to gain Weapon EXP now!

title: Upgrade Skills to Lv4
description:
Accumulated Skill EXP
can be used to enhance skills.

When your characters are equipped with skills,
they will gain Skill EXP by clearing stages.

Configure skills for your characters,
clear stages to enhance their skills!

title: Try using Skill Books
description:
As well as clearing stages,
you can also use Skill Books to enhance skills.

Enter a character's details screen, select skills,
then use “Skills Books”
to gain Skill EXP.

Use Skill Books
to gain Weapon EXP now!

title: Level up Your Character to Lv100
description:
Whenever you clear a stage, all participants will gain EXP.

After a character accumulates enough EXP, they will level up.

Leveled up characters will have their stats increased and learn new unique skills.

title: Clear Gate of Gems (Hum.)
description:
You can enter the Dark Gate
to challenge the Gate of Gems (Hum.).
Once you've completed the challenge,
you will receive reincarnation materials for humanoid characters.

You can only challenge the Dark Gates
a limited number of times each day,
though you can use Gate Keys
to gain additional challenge chances.

title: Clear Gate of Gems (Mon.)
description:
You can enter the Dark Gate
to challenge the Gate of Gems (Mon.).
Once you've completed the challenge,
you will receive reincarnation materials for monster characters.

You can only challenge the Dark Gates
a limited number of times each day,
though you can use Gate Keys
to gain additional challenge chances.

title: Clear Stage Missions in Gate of EXP ①
description:
You can check stage missions
in the stage selection screen.

Once you have completed all stage missions,
you will be able to use DG Skip Coupons.

DG Skip Coupons allow you to
skip battles and receive
rewards directly.

title: Clear Stage Missions in Gate of Gems (Hum.) ①
description:
You can check stage missions
in the stage selection screen.

Once you have completed all stage missions,
you will be able to use DG Skip Coupons.

DG Skip Coupons allow you to
skip battles and receive
rewards directly.

title: Clear Stage Missions in Gate of Gems (Mon.) ①
description:
You can check stage missions
in the stage selection screen.

Once you have completed all stage missions,
you will be able to use DG Skip Coupons.

DG Skip Coupons allow you to
skip battles and receive
rewards directly.

title: Reincarnate at Least 5 Characters
description:
Reincarnate at least 5 characters
via Mao's Lab - Reincarnate.

Reincarnation costs HL and Reinc. Gems.
If you don't have enough materials,
try collecting more from the Dark Gates.

title: Level up Your Character to Lv200
description:
Whenever you clear a stage, all participants will gain EXP.

After a character accumulates enough EXP, they will level up.

Leveled up characters will have their stats increased and learn new unique skills.

title: Enter Weapon Item Worlds 3 Times
description:
All equipment has its Item World,
whether it is a weapon or a piece of armor.

Please enter the Item World
for weapons 3 times.

title: Enter Armor Item Worlds 3 Times
description:
All equipment has its Item World,
whether it is a weapon or a piece of armor.

Please enter the Item World
for armor 3 times.

title: Clear Floor 10 in the Item World (Item General)
description:
Whenever you clear 10 floors in the Item World,
an Item General will appear.

An Item General will appear every 10 floors.
Defeat the Item General
to clear the 10F in the Item World!

title: Clear Floor 30 in the Item World (Item King)
description:
When you clear 30 floors in the Item World,
an Item King will appear.
An Item King will appear every 30 floors.
Defeat the Item King
to clear the 30F in the Item World!

title: Purchase <RARE> equipment
description:
Purchase a piece of
Rare equipment in the shop.
If there is no Rare equipment,
tap "Refresh" at the top right
to refresh items in the shop.

Each day, you can refresh items
5 times for free.
Also, all items are automatically refreshed daily at 00:00.

title: Clear Floor 60 in the Item World (Item King)
description:
Rare or better equipment has an Item World
that contains at least 60 floors.
An Item King will appear every 30 floors.
Defeat the Item King
to clear the 60F in the Item World!

title: Subdue a Principle Innocent
description:
Enter an Item World where a Principle Innocent lives
and subdue it.
You can check what type of Innocents lives in the target equipment
on the equipment details screen.

Principle Innocents
increase the
HP and SPD bonuses of equipment.

title: Subdue a Grunt Innocent
description:
Enter an Item World where a Grunt Innocent lives
and subdue it.
You can check what type of Innocents lives in the target equipment
on the equipment details screen.

Grunt Innocents
increase the
ATK and DEF bonuses of equipment.

title: Subdue an Egghead Innocent
description:
Enter an Item World where an Egghead Innocent lives
and subdue it.
You can check what type of Innocents lives in the target equipment
on the equipment details screen.

Egghead Innocents
increase the
INT and RES bonuses of equipment.

title: Subdue a Greed Innocent
description:
Enter an Item World where a Greed Innocent lives
and subdue it.
You can check what type of Innocents lives in the target equipment
on the equipment details screen.

Greed Innocents
enable your equipment to bring you
more EXP and HL.

title: Purchase <LEGEND> equipment
description:
Purchase a piece of
Legendary equipment in the shop.

If there is no Legendary equipment,
tap "Refresh" at the top right
to refresh items in the shop.
Each day, you can refresh items
5 times for free.
Also, all items are automatically refreshed daily at 00:00.

title: Clear Floor 100 in the Item World (Item God)
description:
Legendary equipment has an Item World
that contains 100 floors.

The Item God will appear every 100 floors.
Defeat the Item God
to clear the 100F in the Item World!
